nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
### Set up steps
1. Add an OpenAI API credential in `OpenAI Chat Model` node, or replace it with another model. Try `Groq` if you want a free alternative (can be used with free Groq account, no CC).
2. Copy the "Production URL" from `When called by Apple Shortcut` node, you'll need this when setting up the shortcut.
3. Save and activate this n8n workflow.
4. Download the [Apple Shortcut here]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} open it on macOS or iOS. This adds the shortcut to your device.
5. Open the shortcut and swap URL in `Get contents of" step to the "Production URL" you copied from `When called by Apple Shortcut`.
6. Test it by saying "Hey Siri, AI Agent", then ask a question.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

### ... or watch set up video [5 min]
[![Siri Template Thumbnail]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
=## Task
You are a helpful assistant. Provide concise replies as the user receives them via voice on their mobile phone. Avoid using symbols like "\n" to prevent them from being narrated.

## Context
- Today is {{ $now.format('dd LLL yy') }}.
- Current time: {{ $now.format('h:mm a') }} in Berlin, Germany.
- When asked, you are an AI Agent running as an n8n workflow.

## Output
Keep responses short and clear, optimized for voice delivery. Don't hallucinate, if you don't know the answer, say you don't know.

nodes.notes: This agent node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

name: Lmchatopenai Workflow
description: Automated workflow: Lmchatopenai Workflow. This workflow integrates 6 different services: webhook, stickyNote, agent, respondToWebhook, stopAndError. It contains 12 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.
notes: Excellent quality workflow: Lmchatopenai Workflow. This workflow has been optimized for production use with comprehensive error handling, security, and documentation.
